014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016/**
017 * A representation of a {@link Factory}'s {@linkplain Factory#create(Creation, ReferenceSelector) creation activity}.
018 *
019 * <p>Most {@link Creation} implementations will, and should, also be {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} implementations.
020 * See {@link DefaultCreation} as one arbitrary example.</p>
021 *
022 * @param <I> the type of instance being created
023 *
024 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
025 */
026public interface Creation<I> extends AutoCloseable, Cloneable {
027
028  /**
029   * Returns the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is in effect (and that is the reason for which this {@link Creation}
030   * has been created), if known, or {@code null} if not.
031   *
032   * @return the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is in effect, or {@code null}
033   *
034   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code null}.
035   */
036  public BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria();
037
038  /**
039   * Clones this {@link Creation} such that the resulting clone will return the supplied {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}
040   * from any invocation of its {@link #beanSelectionCriteria()} method, and, critically, if this {@link Creation}
041   * implementation implements {@link AutoCloseableRegistry}, arranges to have the resulting clone {@linkplain
042   * AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable) registered with} its immediate ancestor (this {@link Creation}) such
043   * that {@linkplain #close() closing} the ancestor (this {@link Creation}) will also {@linkplain #close() close} the
044   * clone.
045   *
046   * <p>If an implementation of this method does not adhere to these requirements, undefined behavior, and possibly
047   * memory leaks, will occur.</p>
048   *
049   * @param beanSelectionCriteria the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} that is the reason for which the resulting clone is
050   * being requested; may be {@code null}
051   *
052   * @return a clone of this {@link Creation}; never {@code null}
053   *
054   * @see #beanSelectionCriteria()
055   *
056   * @see #close()
057   *
058   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry
059   *
060   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable)
061   *
062   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
063   */
064  public Creation<I> clone(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria);
065
066  /**
067   * Closes this {@link Creation}, and, if this {@link Creation} implementation implements {@link
068   * AutoCloseableRegistry}, any clones that were {@linkplain AutoCloseableRegistry#register(AutoCloseable) registered
069   * with it}.
070   *
071   * <p>{@link Factory} implementations (and other user-authored code) normally should not invoke this method, and
072   * indeed doing so may result in undefined behavior and/or an {@link IllegalStateException} being thrown.</p>
073   *
074   * <p>Invoking this method during actual creation may cause undefined behavior and/or an {@link IllegalStateException}
075   * to be thrown.</p>
076   *
077   * @exception IllegalStateException if it is not legal yet to close this {@link Creation}
078   *
079   * @see #clone(BeanSelectionCriteria)
080   *
081   * @see AutoCloseableRegistry
082   *
083   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
084   *
085   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
086   */
087  // MUST be idempotent
088  // During creation (as opposed to destruction) this method should throw an IllegalStateException.
089  @Override // AutoCloseable
090  public void close();
091
092  /**
093   * Casts this {@link Creation} to the inferred return type and returns it.
094   *
095   * <p>Overrides of this default method must return this {@link Creation} cast to the apppropriate type. Any other
096   * return value will result in undefined behavior.</p>
097   *
098   * @param <J> the type of the instance being created
099   *
100   * @return this {@link Creation}, cast to an appropriate type; never {@code null}
101   *
102   * @exception ClassCastException if the cast could not be performed for any reason
103   */
104  public default <J> Creation<J> cast() {
105    return cast(this);
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Signals that the supplied {@code instance} has been created and is about to be made available for use.
110   *
111   * <p>This method is typically invoked from within a {@link Factory#create(Creation, ReferenceSelector)} implementation
112   * immediately prior to its returning a value.</p>
113   *
114   * <p>The default implementation of this method does nothing.</p>
115   *
116   * @param instance the instance that was created; must not be {@code null}
117   *
118   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code instance} was {@code null}
119   *
120   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code instance} was found to be unsuitable for any reason
121   *
122   * @idempotency Overrides of this method must be idempotent.
123   *
124   * @threadsafety Overrides of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
125   */
126  // MUST be idempotent
127  // For incomplete instances
128  public default void created(final I instance) {
129
130  }
131
132
133  /*
134   * Static methods.
135   */
136
137
138  /**
139   * Casts the supplied {@link Creation} to the inferred return type and returns it.
140   *
141   * @param <I> the type of instance being created
142   *
143   * @param c the {@link Creation} to cast and return; may be {@code null}
144   *
145   * @return the {@link Creation}, cast to an appropriate type, or {@code null}
146   */
147  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
148  public static <I> Creation<I> cast(final Creation<?> c) {
149    return (Creation<I>)c;
150  }
151
152}
